items.headline: AMD gets upgrade after stock’s 24% one-day surge. ‘We rarely do this,’ says chagrined analyst.
items.summary_en: It’s likely the first of many — analysts at Jefferies upgraded Advanced Micro Devices to a buy, after the chipmaker’s stock surged on a pact with ChatGPT maker OpenAI.
